[b]Release date: 14/04/2014
Title: Windows 7 SP1 x86 4in1 IE11 April 2014
Developer: MicroSoft / Generation2
Bit: x86
Language: MULTI6/Angliyskiy/nemetsky
Medicine: Present (Windows Loader 2.2.1 by Daz)

System requirements:
Processor with a clock speed of 1.5 GHz or higher
Recommended RAM - 1 GB or more
Requires 18 GB of free disk space
DVD-ROM drive
Keyboard and mouse
Monitor resolution 800/600 or higher
Video Card - 128 MB

Description:
The assembly was based on the original image of Microsoft Windows 7 x86/x64. In one way there are 4 edition: Ultimate, Professional Enterprise, and Home Premium. Were integrated updates on April 8, 2014. Can be set to 6 languages: English, German, Spanish, French, Italian and Portuguese (Brasil). Russian official language pack can be downloaded from MicroSoft. install.wim compressed format (install.esd).

Composition editors:
Windows 7 Home Premium
Windows 7 Professional
Windows 7 Ultimate
Windows 7 Enterprise

Dostunye languages:
en-US [English]
de-DE [German]
es-ES [Spanish]
fr-FR [French]
it-IT [Italian]
pt-BR [Portuguese (Brasil)]

Features assemblies:
Integrated software updates for Windows, on April 8, 2014
NET Framework 4.5.1 is integrated
Integrated Internet Explorer 11
No programs have not been established
added USB3, Sata and network drivers.
Diagnostics and Recovery Toolset 8.1 (Microsoft DaRT)

In the final step:
KB890930
Defender Updates


On activation:
At the last stage of the installation window appears WPI
If you want to activate Windows, select "Activation"
If not, just click on "Exit".
My advice: be sure to select "Activation" on this WPI and your Windows will be activated without any problems.
In any case in the archive there is an activator Windows Loader 2.2.1 by Daz

Installing the software:
With WPI-window, you'll be able to install additional software.
Simply select the program you want to install and click on "Start Installation"
If for any reason you missed the installation WPI, you can run it later, it is in the image folder  sources  $ oem $

Mozilla Firefox
Opera Chrome
7-zip 9.25
Adobe Reader
Adobe Flashplayer
DirectX
MSE
WinRAR 5.10
